description: This file defines the main frontend component 'App' for a note-taking application, managing layout, note state, and keyboard shortcuts using the Blits framework and Lightning.js components.

classes.name: Component (Blits.Component)
classes.description: The main Blits component class used to define the App component, managing UI layout and user interactions.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Handles selection of a note given its ID, updating internal state and UI.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles deletion of a note given its ID, updating the note list and UI accordingly.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves or updates a note with given ID, title, and content; also generates a new ID for new notes.

methods.name: _createNewNote
methods.description: Initializes creation of a new note by clearing current selection and editor fields.

methods.name: _saveCurrentNote
methods.description: Extracts note data from the editor and calls save; also validates presence of title.

methods.name: _applyResponsive
methods.description: Adjusts layout responsiveness based on window size, switching between split and stacked views.

methods.name: _syncUI
methods.description: Synchronizes the UI components with the current application state.
